title: Replace the two Brands Banner logo images with provided URLs

requirements.text: Update the two logo elements in the HomePage section 3 "Brands We Deal In" banner (rendered by frontend/src/components/home/BrandsBanner.tsx) so that: - Element 1 (/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[3]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) uses src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3c/Siemens_AG_logo.svg" - Element 2 (/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[3]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/img[1]) uses src="https://www.ruralelec.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Schneider-Electric-logo-jpg-.png" Apply changes only to these two selected logo elements.

quotes: replace the logo photos with the images link https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3c/Siemens_AG_logo.svg and https://www.ruralelec.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Schneider-Electric-logo-jpg-.png

acceptanceCriteria: The first brand logo image in the banner loads from https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3c/Siemens_AG_logo.svg.
The second brand logo image in the banner loads from https://www.ruralelec.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Schneider-Electric-logo-jpg-.png.
No other images/logos on the page are changed.
The banner layout and existing styling (size, object-contain, grayscale hover effect) remain intact.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not add new brand logos or change the number/order of logos beyond updating the two specified images.
Do not implement backend changes (no Motoko updates required).
